metadata.title: CVE-2020-5267 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In ActionView before versions 6.0.2.2 and 5.2.4.2, there is a possible XSSvulnerability in ActionView's JavaScript literal escape helpers. Views thatuse the `j` or `escape_javascript` methods may be susceptible to XSSattacks. The issue is fixed in versions 6.0.2.2 and 5.2.4.2.

criterions.comment: rails: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
